messages.title: Caring and Campaigning for Rushcliffe
messages.content: Working for you in Westminster since 2010.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We have supported business to create over two million jobs and have cut tax, national debt is falling as a percentage of GDP.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working for a better health service
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Everyone agrees the principle of free NHS treatment. This Government has increased spending as much as we could sensibly afford.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour would tax and borrow. Liberal's old guard like to say 'we told you so'.

issues.economy: We inherited a bankrupt country from New Labour. Our deficit will be cleared by 2017-18.
issues.education: I want Britain to have education who believes that excellent schools are enormously important for our future.
issues.governance: As Lord Chancellor I launched prison reform. I cut red tape. I improved the efficiency of the court system.
issues.health: Everyone agrees the principle of free NHS treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: I seek to continue to represent Rushcliffe in national and local affairs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Was a very successful Chancellor of the Exchequer.

images.caption: Kenneth Clarke with various people, appearing in different contexts related to his political career.
